Django Admin Register

Descripción

Quick register a model in Django admin


File Template: ✅


Prefix

dj:admin


Scopes

python


Snippet de código

from django.contrib import admin
from .models import ${1:ModelName}

@admin.register(${1:ModelName})
class ${1:ModelName}Admin(admin.ModelAdmin):
	list_display = (${2:'field1', 'field2'})
	search_fields = (${3:'field1', 'field2'})
	list_filter = (${4:'created', 'updated'})
